title: Conductive Sheaths, Armours, and Screens of Cables
fullText: Conductive sheaths, armours, and screens of cables and associated fittings that are required to be earthed, including those used as an earthing medium, shall be mechanically and electrically continuous. The impedance of such cable components and associated fittings providing earth continuity shall be in accordance with that required for a copper earthing conductor determined in accordance with Clause 5.3.3.
